name: The Final Power Level Warrior (RPG)
description:
Choose your favorite power level warrior and make him the most powerful of them all. Battle trough various challenging challenges and unlock new heroes or villains to play with. Train and discover hidden abilities and transformations to increase your final power level.

- fast real time battle system
- unlock and play with a number of hero and enemy dragon warriors
- rpg leveling system to train your dragon warriors and raise their power levels

- discover hidden transformations for super huge powerlevel boosts:
* false super yasain
* super yasain 1, 2, 3, blue
* spirit boost 1, 2, 3
* thunder mode
* god spirit mode
* sage form 1, 2, 3
* legendary sage form
* and more...

- master various abilities to further enhance your dragon warriors like:
* ball of power
* spirit energy wave
* lightning strike
* wind slash
* super sonic wave
* energy ball blast
* and more...
